title: Wally's Organic Aromatherapy Energy Essential Oil Roll-On 0.33 OZ - Koshervitamins.com -
description: Seize the day with Wally's Natural Organic Energy Aromatherapy. Awaken your morning, invigorate your afternoon, and catch your second wind with the stimulating mixture of organic Sweet Orange, Grapefruit, and Peppermint essential oils. Made with a convenient to use rollerball applicator, this unique essential oil blend is easy to use. Simply roll over your pulse points located on your wrist, neck or inside of elbow and enjoy the sweet, exciting lift of Energy Carry this organic essential oil blend with you to energize your senses at any moment.
